title: Self-Directed Mathematics Practical Project for Strengthening Information Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and proficiency in general office software
context.additional_context: Building a Mathematics Information Management System for In-Service Elementary School Teachers to Utilize in Educational Settings

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify and store class-specific mathematics assessment data using digital tools.
Learners can efficiently manage mathematics resources generated in educational settings according to information prioritization criteria.
Learners can document and share mathematics education information management processes through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
